definition: to help develop the border areas
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: By using the concept of generalized simply supported edge together with the method of superposition, we can solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 用廣義簡支邊這個概念及疊加法，就可以解這類問題。

sentences.english: The boundary conditions at simply supported boundary and fixed boundary of a slab.
sentences.chinese: 板的簡支邊和固定邊的邊界條件。
